Table.ACV_TXT_Header_Diary: Read the journal of an unnamed alchemist.
Table.ACV_TXT_Header_Record: Review your Speed Run Mode times.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_001: A Shardbinder who has lived for 18 years and been frozen in time for another 10. She was taken as a child by the Alchemy Guild and implanted with crystal that lets her wield demonic powers. Miriam was to be sacrificed in the great demon summoning, but fell into a deep sleep and was spared. Now she has woken to the news that Gebel— a man she loves like a brother—may have opened the gates of Hell once again.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_002: A Shardbinder who grew up with Miriam and was raised by the Alchemy Guild. He was sacrificed in the great demon summoning, and was the only one besides Miriam to survive.  Enraged, he slaughtered his supposed "family," the Alchemists, and disappeared. While Miriam slept, Gebel grew older. Now, he has returned to England with a horde of demons and a hellish castle at his command. (Age: 30)
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_003: A former member of the Alchemy Guild. Unaware of the organization's darker plans, he befriended Miriam and Gebel, who were close in age. After the Guild's demise, Johannes allied himself with Dominique and the Church, using his skills as an Alchemist to learn more about the shards and predict when Miriam would wake. Together, they have vowed to go to Gebel's castle and put a stop to his plans. (Age: 33)
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_004: An exorcist the Church has sent alongside Zangetsu to investigate the demon castle. Dominique knows who Johannes and Miriam are, and has asked Johannes to bring Miriam to Arvantville where she has set up an outpost. She asks Miriam—whose ample talent she recognizes—to go after Gebel, and tasks Zangetsu with dealing with another intruder. (Age: 25)
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_005: A demonslayer from Nippon. No one knows his real name. He and others were called to England ten years ago to fight against the demons. The violent battle cost Zangetsu an eye and an arm, and all of his comrades perished. He has since aligned himself with the Church, and seeks a chance at vengeance and atonement, since many of the demons have ties to his homeland. (Age: 35)
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_006: A member of the Alchemy Guild that turned Miriam and Gebel into Shardbinders, opened the gates of Hell, and nearly destroyed the world. Johannes once looked up to him as a teacher. Somehow, Alfred survived Gebel's murderous rampage and has been searching for a lost tome called the Liber Logaeth. The book is integral to the summoning of demons, and now Alfred sees an opportunity to wrest control of the book away from Gebel. (Age: 57)
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_007: A vampire named Orlok Fahrenheit Dracule who presides over the Livre Ex Machina library. He cares about nothing but books, and as a consequence treats demons and humans with equal disinterest. (Presumed age: 400)
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_008: One of the 72 demons of Solomon. She never leaves Gebel undefended.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_009: The most powerful of the 72 demons of Solomon, and king of the demon horde.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_010: A girl whose parents were killed when demons from the castle attacked Arvantville. Dominique saved her life and has decided to look after her. Anne is friendly and eager to help, although sometimes she can be a bit unmanageable. (Age: 12)
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_011: A survivor of the attack on Arvantville. The demons destroyed his fields, but he hopes to replant and start anew. (Age: 37)
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_012: A man who inadvertently fled into the demon castle to escape the attack on Arvantville. Now he is surrounded and too scared to even stand, let alone find his way out. (Age 32)
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_013: A survivor of the attack on Arvantville. She is the oldest person in the village. Susie was in ill health to begin with, and recent events have taken a toll on her mental well-being. (Age 78)
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_014: A survivor of the attack on Arvantville. While she managed to hide from the demons, she watched helplessly as her family and friends were slaughtered. Now her hatred for the demons knows no bounds. (Age: 34)
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_015: A survivor of the attack on Arvantville. The deaths of the other villagers has left her with a deep sadness, and she wants to find a way for them to rest in peace. (Age: 27)
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_016: A man who was turned into a demon by a cursed pair of scissors some time ago. However, Todd retains control of his mental faculties and won't attack Miriam like other killer barbers. To lift his curse, he needs to snip his way through 666 different hairstyles.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_017: Condensed demonic power in crystal form. No ordinary human can wield shards; they must be assimilated into the body by individuals known as Shardbinders. Sometimes, when a demon is destroyed in the human world, its residual power will crystallize into shard form.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_018: A term for people that the Alchemy Guild implanted with special crystal that binds with demonic power. The crystal infests the human body and, left unchecked, will corrupt it entirely. Johannes has found a way to temporarily halt Miriam's corruption, but he cannot reverse it. The Alchemy Guild sacrificed most of the Shardbinders, using their demonic connection to open the gates of Hell.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_019: Also known as "Spiritus Aureum." The Guild once possessed great influence over the aristocracy, but their power began to wane at the dawn of the Industrial Revolution. Desperate, the Guild's top members called forth a horde of demons to prove the need for their existence.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_020: The castle Miriam is exploring was summoned into the same space occupied by the former Alchemy Guild, and thus shares many of its features.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_021: The 72 demons of Solomon and the other creatures of Hell that attend them.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_022: A book written in Enochian script by an English alchemist. The glyphs were originally used to summon good spirits, but members of the Alchemy Guild reconfigured the ritual in order to summon demons instead.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_023: A sword with the power to deal lethal damage to creatures like Gremory who exist simultaneously in this world and the other.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_024: Talismans imbued with dharmic power. They augment Zangetsu's strength in place of the eye and arm he lost, and allow him to create special zones over which he has absolute control.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_025: Press the <input id="TriggerShard"/> to expend MP and use your Conjure Shard. Generally, Conjure Shards are attacks.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_026: Use the <input id="EffectiveShard"/> to expend MP and use your Manipulative Shard. There are two types. Press the button to use "Single Shot" Manipulative Shards, and hold the button to use "Sustained" Manipulative Shards.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_027: Tilt the <image id="RStickMove"/> to aim Miriam's hand, then press the <input id="DirectionalShard"/> to use your Directional Shard in that direction.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_028: A Passive Shard takes effect as soon as you equip it and doesn't consume any MP. Generally, Passive Shards improve Miriam's physical capabilities.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_029: While equipped, a Familiar Shard summons forth a demon companion that levels up just like Miriam. Familiars do not consume MP.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_030: Skill Shards grant special abilities and do not take up any of your shard slots or use MP. They can be individually turned ON/OFF in the Shard Menu.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_031: A shard's Grade indicates its power or effect. Each duplicate shard you collect increases that shard's Grade, up to a maximum of 9.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_032: You can increase a shard's Rank by enhancing it alchemically. Increasing a Passive Shard's Rank to 9 will convert it into a Skill Shard.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_033: Each Familiar Shard has a level. The familiar you have summoned receives EXP for any enemies Miriam defeats, and will eventually level up.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_034: Techniques are special moves tied to specific weapons. By inputting the right sequence of buttons, you can expend MP and use the technique.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_035: As you repeatedly defeat enemies with the same weapon technique, you will gain mastery of that technique. Once it is fully mastered, you can use the technique with any weapon of the same type.
Table.ACV_TXT_TIPS_EXPLAIN_036: A purple, glowing rose that can be found by breaking candleholders and sconces. Pick it up to regain a little MP.

Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN2:
Press A button to jump. 
Hold down A to jump higher.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN3: Hold↓+ A to jump through thin platforms.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN4: Press↓ on the D-Pad/L Stick to Crouch.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN8: Press <input id="Up"/> on the D-Pad/L Stick to search.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN9: Press menu button to enter Main Menu.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN10: Press the View Button to view the Full Map
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN11: Press A button during a jump to do a Double Jump.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN12: Use the R Stick to aim with Miriam's arm.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN13:
Miriam can unlock certain doors
by holding her arm up to them.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN14:
You can obtain shards from some
candleholders by breaking them.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN15:
Select EQUIPMENT to access your
weapons and other equipment.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN16:
Choose a slot to display a list of equipment
that can be used in that slot.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN17: Now select the equipment you want to use.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN18:
The parameter will change when items are equipped.
In some cases, special attributes are added.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN19: Press the View Button to return.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN20:
Press Y Button to activate Trigger Shard.
This is used mainly for projectile magic. Consumes MP.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN21:
Aim with R Stick and press RT to activate.
Cast magic towards the aimed direction. Consumes MP.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN22: Enchant Shard is automatically activated when it is equipped.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN23:
Shard is a crystallized form of demon power. 
An ordinary person cannot control it.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN24:
Mana Roses restore a small amount of MP.
They are found in candleholders when your MP is low.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN25:
This room will allow you to save your game.
When you press <input id="Up"/> in front of the chair, enter（ここの部分は既存画像で表示）
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN26: Use R Stick to aim with Miriam's arm.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN27: Hold <input id="Up"/> on the D-Pad/L Stick to place a pointer on the map.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN28: Consumable items can be used in the Inventory （ここにメニューのアイコン）
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN29: Tilt R Stick to aim with Miriam's arm.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN30:
Gun is long-range and very powerful
but it consumes bullets.
Table.TUTORIAL_EXPLAIN31:
When the equipped bullet runs out,
it will change to an unlimited, but weaker bullet.
Table.SYS_SAVE_NEWGAME: Start the game from the beginning.
Table.TUTORIAL_RESUME: Resume this game where you left off.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN01:
You can continue firing after running out of ammo,
but you will be switched to weaker bullets.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN02:
Firearms let you deal heavy damage from a distance,
but they use up ammunition.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN03: Attacking leaves you vulnerable, but you can backstep out of the attack to avoid taking a hit.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN04: Poison gradually depletes your HP until the condition wears off.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN05: A curse will reduce your maximum HP and MP until the condition wears off.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN06: The "slow" condition temporarily causes all your movement to slow down.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN07:
STR affects your physical attack power,
while INT influences magical attack power.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN08:
CON helps determine your physical defense,
while MND factors toward magical defense.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN09:
LCK plays a part in many things,
including how often enemies drop items.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN10:
Hold <input id="Up"/> to place a marker on the map.
You can delete markers on the Map Screen.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN11: You can perform one additional attack while backstepping.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN12:
If you have shoes equipped,
their attack power is added to your slide.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN13:
Tilt <input id="RStickMove"/> to direct Miriam's hand.
Some magical apparatuses will respond to this.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN14:
Sometimes, when you visit the shop,
you will receive hints about how to proceed.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN15: You can resize and reposition the minimap via the Map Screen.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN16: Beastly enemies are generally resistant to striking attacks but susceptible to fire.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN17: Armored foes are usually resistant to slash attacks but weak against striking attacks and thunder.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN18: Most airborne enemies are susceptible to thrusting attacks.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN19: Some enemy attacks can be avoided simply by crouching.
Table.TIPS_MSG_EXPLAIN20: If your HP gets low, go to your Inventory via the Main Menu and use healing items like potions.
